message: Let's split it 50/50 to get it over with
You can't get away with 50/50 that easily!
Meet me in the middle, I'm willing to give you a bit more
You're getting closer, but still too little for me!
Last chance to make a deal, don't leave me with scraps
I'm not desperate yet, but I'll give you a chance to make it right
Last chance, I'm practically begging you to accept this
You're running out of chances, Alice, get serious!
